item.title: 6 Tips For Dealing With A Relapse - Counselling & Therapy Online
item.description:
6 Tips For Dealing With A Relapse - Counselling & Therapy Online

Well let's look at the options; you can do one of five things Writhe around in self-flagellating shame and drink / use more to numb it Consider yourself a loser/failure and give up all hope of being able to change - drink or use more, what's the point in trying?

item.title: Addiction - The Fallacy of Treating it as a Disease.
item.description:
Addiction - The Fallacy of Treating it as a Disease.

The debate about the nature of addiction has raged for decades. Is it disease? Is it a matter of choice? Is it a weakness of character? A moral failing? Today, the most widespread and prevalent view is that addiction is a chronic relapsing brain disease.
